sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM TABLE(gipi_wpictures_pkg.get_item_attachments(#parId#, #itemNo#))
select * from table(Gipi_Witem_Pkg.get_gipi_witem(#parId#))
SELECT count(*) count FROM gipi_witem WHERE par_id = #parId#
select * from table(gipi_witem_pkg.get_tsi_prem_amt(#parId#,#itemNo#))
select * from table(gipi_witem_pkg.get_distinct_gipi_item(#parId#))
SELECT VAL_ENDT_ADD_ITEM(#parId#, #itemNo#, #lineCd#, #sublineCd#, #issCd#, #issueYy#, #polSeqNo#, #renewNo#, #effDate#) FROM DUAL
SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.get_endt_add_item_list(#parId#, #itemNo#, #lineCd#, #sublineCd#, #issCd#, #issueYy#, #polSeqNo#, #renewNo#, #effDate#))

SELECT par_id, item_no, item_title, item_grp, item_desc, item_desc2, tsi_amt, prem_amt, ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, payt_terms, changed_tag FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_GIPI_WITEM_FOR_PAR(#parId#)) ORDER BY par_id, item_no

SELECT par_id, item_no, item_title, item_grp, item_desc, item_desc2, tsi_amt, prem_amt, ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, payt_terms, changed_tag FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_GIPI_WITEM_FOR_PAR(#parId#)) ORDER BY par_id, item_no

SELECT par_id, item_no, item_title, item_grp, item_desc, item_desc2, tsi_amt, prem_amt, ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, payt_terms, changed_tag FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_GIPI_WITEM_FOR_PAR(#parId#)) ORDER BY par_id, item_no

SELECT par_id, item_no, ESCAPE_VALUE(item_title) item_title, item_grp, ESCAPE_VALUE(item_desc) item_desc, ESCAPE_VALUE(item_desc2) item_desc2, tsi_amt, prem_amt, ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, ESCAPE_VALUE(currency_desc) currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, ESCAPE_VALUE(other_info) other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, prorate_flag, comp_sw, GIPI_WITMPERL_GROUPED_PKG.gipi_witmperl_grouped_exist(par_id, item_no) "gipi_witmperl_grouped_exist", payt_terms FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_GIPI_WITEM_FOR_PAR(#parId#)) ORDER BY par_id, item_no

SELECT par_id, item_no, item_title, item_grp, item_desc, item_desc2, tsi_amt, prem_amt, ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, prorate_flag, comp_sw, itmperl_grouped_exists "gipi_witmperl_grouped_exist", short_rt_percent, payt_terms, changed_tag FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_GIPI_WITEM(#parId#)) ORDER BY par_id, item_no

ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, ESCAPE_VALUE(currency_desc) currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, ESCAPE_VALUE(other_info) other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, payt_terms FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_GIPI_WITEM_FOR_PACK_POLICY(#packParId#)) ORDER BY item_no, par_id

SELECT par_id, item_no, ESCAPE_VALUE(item_title) item_title, item_grp, ESCAPE_VALUE(item_desc) item_desc, ESCAPE_VALUE(item_desc2) item_desc2, tsi_amt, prem_amt, ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, ESCAPE_VALUE(currency_desc) currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, ESCAPE_VALUE(other_info) other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, payt_terms FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_GIPI_WITEM_FOR_PACK_POL(#packParId#)) ORDER BY item_no, par_id
SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.GET_PACKAGE_RECORDS(#packParId#))
SELECT gipi_witem_pkg.check_item_exist(#parId#) FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT par_id, item_no, (item_title) item_title, item_grp, (item_desc) item_desc, (item_desc2) item_desc2, tsi_amt, prem_amt, ann_prem_amt, ann_tsi_amt, rec_flag, currency_cd, currency_rt, (currency_desc) currency_desc, group_cd, from_date, to_date, pack_line_cd, pack_subline_cd, discount_sw, coverage_cd, (other_info) other_info, surcharge_sw, region_cd, risk_no, risk_item_no, payt_terms FROM TABLE(gipi_witem_pkg.get_gipi_witem_for_par_tg(#parId#, #itemNo#, #itemTitle#, #itemDesc#, #itemDesc2#))
ORDER BY item_no ASC
ORDER BY item_no
ORDER BY item_title
ORDER BY item_desc, item_desc2
ORDER BY item_desc
ORDER BY item_desc2
ORDER BY currency_cd
ORDER BY currency_rt
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT COUNT(*) count_ FROM TABLE(gipi_witem_pkg.get_gipi_witem_for_par_tg(#parId#, #itemNo#, #itemTitle#, #itemDesc#, #itemDesc2#))) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIPI_WITEM_PKG.get_item_lov(#parId#))
WHERE (UPPER(item_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(item_title) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) )
ORDER BY item_no
ORDER BY item_title
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM TABLE (GIPI_WITEM_PKG.get_item_list2(#parId#))
WHERE (UPPER(item_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(item_title) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) )
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#
